message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to see if we can get even closer to my target price.

Bob, I understand you're aiming for $9,000, and I'm willing to compromise. However, $9,500 is the best I can do right now. This price still leaves some room for you to profit, and it's closer to my value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $9,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $9,250. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
